page.title: 04SOME FACTS _ SKELMERSDALE
page.content: There are several "Industrial Estates"in Skelmersdale and three of the largest are contained in our survey block. The Gillibrands sites,East and West,are within easy reach of the Motorway system.The M58 Motorway skirts the industrial estate and provides fast communication with the docks and airport at Liverpool,15 miles to the west.To the east it connects with the main M6 London to Scotland motorway. At present,almost 7000 people are employed in industry in the town and a further 6000 in other jobs.The total population of the town is estimated to be 41,800 of which number 35,000 are "new" residents (Since 1964). The distribution statistics show that there are 3.03 persons per household.
